name: Phantom GhostDOG
description: Phantom GhostDOG $PHANT is a play on the original Kaspa whitepaper "Phantom GhostDAG," and is a KRC20 inscription based meme token intending to educate the public on the novel technology associated with Kaspa. $PHANT is the digital spirit animal mascot of the Kaspa blockDAG. Phantom GhostDOG is a gateway meme that will bring meme degens to the Kaspa ecosystem. Come for the memes and stay for the education!
